meanings.definition: Feeling or showing anxiety or apprehension.
meanings.sent1: She looked the angstiest before the big test.
meanings.sent2: He always appears the angstiest when meeting new people.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed angstiest when faced with a cucumber.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds looming overhead made the atmosphere feel angstiest.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence in the haunted house was the angstiest thing she had ever experienced.

meanings.sent1: She was the angstiest in the group before the roller coaster ride.
meanings.sent2: The angstiest in the room couldn't sit still during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The angstiest in the office was known for always checking the weather forecast.
meanings.sent4: The storm chaser was considered the angstiest among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The protagonist in the horror movie was portrayed as the angstiest character, always on edge.
